title: [K-12] Considering Cultural Diversity in Online Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary Mathematical Concepts and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Online Mathematics Education Environment with Real-Time Participation by Learners from Diverse Cultural Backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three principles of designing online mathematics education materials that consider cultural differences.
Learners can comparatively analyze the diversity of problem-solving approaches in mathematics for global learner groups.
Learners can propose at least two assessment methods for online mathematics classes that reflect cultural contexts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
